org.chronos.chronodb.api

Interface SerializationManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InMemorySerializationManager

    public interface SerializationManager
    The SerializationManager is responsible for conversion between Object and byte[] representation.

    Every ChronoDB instance has its own SerializationManager, which can be retrieved via ChronoDB.getSerializationManager().

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.Object deserialize(byte[] serialForm)
      Deserializes the given byte[] back into its Object representation.
      byte[] serialize(java.lang.Object object)
      Serializes the given object into its byte[] representation.

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        byte[] serialize(java.lang.Object object)
        Serializes the given object into its byte[] representation.
        Parameters:
        object - The object to serialize. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The serial form of the passed object.

      • deserialize

        java.lang.Object deserialize(byte[] serialForm)
        Deserializes the given byte[] back into its Object representation.
        Parameters:
        serialForm - The byte array to deserialize. Must not be null.
        Returns:
        The object representation of the passed byte array.
